ref: 1713 utkarṣa m. ʻ drawing upwards, eminence ʼ Mn., adj. ʻ superior, boastful ʼ Yājñ. [√kr̥ṣ]
Pa. ukkaṁsa -- m. ʻ exaltation ʼ, ˚aka -- ʻ raising ʼ;

lang: Aśokan, i.e. the language of the Inscriptions of Aśoka
ref: Aś. ukasā nom. pl. m. ʻ superiors ʼ;
Pk. ukkassa -- , ˚kāsa -- , ˚kasa -- , ˚karisa -- m. ʻ superiority, pride ʼ, adj. ʻ superior, proud ʼ;
Si. ukasa, ˚aha ʻ pledge, pawn, security ʼ Geiger EGS 24 with doubt on semant. grounds, but for ʻ raising ʼ > ʻ pledge ʼ cf. uddhārá -- ʻ raising ʼ > ʻ debt ʼ.
